feature_model.name: Mobile Media until relase 7

meta.data: Last releases of Mobile Media (first called Mobile Photo ). This feature model was created originally by Eduardo Figuereido in ICSE08 that also provides more releases.
Mauricio Alferez - Trascribed from Figueiredo. et.al at ICSE08
CITI, Departamento de informática, Universidade Nova de Lisboa

Eduardo Figueiredo, Nélio Cacho, Cláudio Sant'Anna, Mario Monteiro, Uirá Kulesza, Alessandro Garcia, Sérgio Soares, Fabiano Cutigi Ferrari, Safoora Shakil Khan, Fernando Castor Filho, Francisco Dantas: Evolving software product lines with aspects: an empirical study on design stability. ICSE 2008: 261-270

feature_model.feature_tree: :r Type name for root feature(_r) :m Album Management(_r_1) :m Create Album(_r_1_2) :m Delete Album(_r_1_3) :m Media Management(_r_5) :o Favorites(_r_5_6) :m Basic Media Operations(_r_5_7) :m Create Media(_r_5_7_8) :m Delete Media(_r_5_7_9) :m Edit Media Label(_r_5_7_10) :o Sorting(_r_5_13) :o Copy Media(_r_5_14) :o SMS(_r_5_16) :m Media Selection(_r_17) :g (_r_17_19) [1,*] : Music(_r_17_19_20) : Photo(_r_17_19_21) : Video(_r_17_19_22)
